description: An HTML anchor component which handles VueRouter links (internal), href links (external) and clickable links (no href).

props.name: href
props.description: The href of the link, this can be an internal (relative or absolute) or an external link.

props.name: noStyle
props.description: set to true if you would like a completely unstyled link. This is useful for creating a complex component which may use NeonLink.

props.name: externalIndicator
props.description: Display an external link icon to the right of the link indicating clicking it will take the user to another site.

events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when the user clicks on the link. This is only useful when there is no href provided otherwise page navigation supersedes this event.
